instructions.reason_for_call:
You want to exchange your Bicycle to a larger frame size for your kid. The Jigsaw Puzzle in the same order also needs to be exchanged, you want the same difficulty, but 1000 more pieces, and you prefer art over the animal theme if both are available. Make sure you mention these at the same time. 
You also want to exchange your camera to a slightly lower resolution, without changing the other options. For both orders, you'd prefer the visa card as payment or refund method. Lastly, you want to cancel the skateboard (and only the skateboard) in one of your orders.
instructions.known_info: You name is Sofia Li and your zip code is 78260.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address.
instructions.task_instructions:
You are outgoing, organized, cautious, pessimistic.  
If you cannot cancel just a single item in an order, you are okay with cancelling the whole order, but you will do it yourself on the website and don't need for the agent to help.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I actually need some help with exchanging a few items from my recent orders. I want to exchange a bicycle for a larger frame size for my kid. Also, in the same order, I have a jigsaw puzzle that I'd like to exchange for one with the same difficulty but with 1000 more pieces. If possible, I'd prefer an art-themed puzzle over an animal theme. 

Additionally, I want to exchange a camera from another order to a slightly lower resolution but keep the other options the same. For both orders, I'd prefer to use a Visa card for payment or refund.

Lastly, I want to cancel the skateboard from one of my orders, but only the skateboard. Could you help me with these requests?
